name: Royal Gambling
description:
Royal Gambling a LxmeStudxos special Production

Play the most popular casino games like Black Jack, Roulette, Poker ... . Gamble locally or online with your friends.

Controls:
  • Menu: Escape
  • Interact: Left click
  • Black Jack
    • Stand: Space
    • Hit: Return
    • Double: D
    • Split: S
    • Change View: Left & Right Arrow
    • Zoom: Page up & down
EARLY ACCESS:

This game is currently in early access and not all of the mentioned games will be playable yet. Please also keep in mind that this game can contain bugs and performance issues. If so please report them, thank you!

This game is completely free to play but you can support me and the development of future games by donating :)
